title: Refutability in Rust Pattern Matching
description: In this lab, we will learn about the concept of refutability in patterns and how it affects the matching process in Rust, including the distinction between refutable and irrefutable patterns and how to use them correctly in different constructs such as let statements and if let expressions.

meta.title: Refutability: Whether a Pattern Might Fail to Match | Rust Programming
meta.description: Learn about the concept of refutability in Rust patterns and how it affects the matching process. Explore the distinction between refutable and irrefutable patterns and their usage in different constructs.
meta.keywords: Rust, Programming, Patterns, Refutability, Irrefutable, Refutable

steps.title: Refutability: Whether a Pattern Might Fail to Match

i18n.title: Rust 模式匹配中的可反驳性
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将学习模式中的可反驳性概念，以及它如何影响 Rust 中的匹配过程，包括可反驳模式和不可反驳模式之间的区别，以及如何在不同的结构（如 let 语句和 if let 表达式）中正确使用它们。

meta.title: 可反驳性：模式是否可能匹配失败 | Rust 编程
meta.description: 了解 Rust 模式中的可反驳性概念及其对匹配过程的影响。探索可反驳模式和不可反驳模式之间的区别以及它们在不同结构中的用法。
meta.keywords: Rust, 编程, 模式, 可反驳性, 不可反驳的, 可反驳的

steps.title: 可反驳性：模式是否可能匹配失败
